name: Cyan Avenger
description:
This is a game that combines bullet evasion, flying shooting, and rhythm music gameplay. There is a unique way of storytelling. You can enjoy the joy of fighting against other spacecraft from a 2D perspective, accompanied by music. The game level belongs to small games.

10 levels, 11 types of hostile spacecraft.

5 available weapons and rich upgrades.

5 built-in battle music pieces.

You can import your favorite music for editing and use in battles.

Completing the level will unlock a new storyline.
